Name: Nature Escapes
About the game: Experience Nature's wild beauty in stunning locales from across the globe, while decorating your garden with plants and flowers you've never seen before! 24 chapters of nature fun! Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames! Fun facts about fun plants! Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes! Decorate your very own garden!
